# Ace, Jack & King

| length     = 49:28
| label      = CD Baby
| producer   = Eli Cook

}}
| rev2 = The Rocktologist

Ace, Jack & King  is the fifth album by Virginia-based blues rock artist, Eli Cook. It was released in 2011.
The album contains a combination of Cook's acoustic blues and folk stylings with his electric hard rock touch. Vintage Guitar Magazine said of the album's sound, "A throaty vocal matches the crunchy guitars that lean as much toward metal as they do blues.â€œ
Personnel
*Eli Cook- Vocals, Guitars, Mandolin
*Brian "Boogie" Thomas- Bass
*Wade Warfield- Drums, Percussion
*Wavorly Milor- Harmonica
Track listing
All songs written by Eli Cook, except where noted.
